Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Unsafe member access .update on an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .eq on an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .eq on an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .neq on an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .in on an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .message on an `any` value.
